author: gbrown
msg: Apply instance setters before adding an element value to its parent sequence in WTKXSerializer; disallow addition of ActionMappings with null keyStroke or action properties in Window.ActionMappingSequence.

author: lektran
msg: OFBIZ-2625 Ability to perform product comparisons in ecommerce and during order entry in ordermgr.
Compares things like name, price, description, long description, brand name and standard, distinguishing and optional features.
Could do with some styling and would be nice to add customer ratings in there as well.

author: josh
msg: Improvements to formula evaluation treatment of -0.0. (Refinements to fix for bug 47198

author: ppoddar
msg: OPENJPA-1195: Datastore function for in general usage as well as JPA 2.0. CriteriaQuery Parameter indexing during registration.

author: lhazlewood
msg: Continued work homogenizing Session access - previous work on DefaultSubjectFactory and DefaultSecurityManager allowed the removal of the WebSubjectFactory entirely.  Made minor code enhancements per IDEA inspections.  Enabled log4j as the logging mechanism for test cases, but will probably change that to be Logback so we can have one less jar dependency.  Lots of minor JavaDoc fixes
